assessment_item.title: ಇವರು ಸಂಪತ್ತಿನ ಸೋರುವಿಕೆ ಸಿದ್ಧಾಂತದ ಪ್ರತಿಪಾದಕರು.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಇವರು ಸಂಪತ್ತಿನ ಸೋರುವಿಕೆ ಸಿದ್ಧಾಂತದ ಪ್ರತಿಪಾದಕರು.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಬಾಲಗಂಗಾಧರ ತಿಲಕ್ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3480"},{"text":"

ಮಹದೇವ ಗೋವಿಂದ ರಾನಡೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3481"},{"text":"

ಗೋಪಾಲ ಕೃಷ್ಣ ಗೋಖಲೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3491"},{"text":"

ದಾದಾ ಬಾಯಿ ನವರೋಜಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:3496"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಇವರು ಸಂಪತ್ತಿನ ಸೋರುವಿಕೆ ಸಿದ್ಧಾಂತದ ಪ್ರತಿಪಾದಕರು.
